Interface LightweightDao

public interface LightweightDao

A lightweight dao interface.

load

java.lang.Object load(java.lang.Class clazz,
                      java.io.Serializable key)
                      throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
Retrieve an object from the datastore by id.

Parameters:
clazz - the object class.
key - the key to search for
Returns:
the object if found, or null.
Throws:
org.springframework.dao.DataRetrievalFailureException - if can't connect to the datastore.
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException

find

java.util.Collection find(java.lang.String query,
                          java.lang.Object values)
                          throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
A method to return query results.

Implementation should inspect the values parameter to distinguish if a single object is beeing passed or if it is an array of objects before taking the appropriate action.

Parameters:
query - A query string.
values - Parameters.
Returns:
the result list.
Throws:
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException

findUnique

java.lang.Object findUnique(java.lang.String query,
                            java.lang.Object values)
                            throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
A method to return a single object from query results.

Implementation should inspect the values parameter to distinguish if a single object is beeing passed or if it is an array of objects before taking the appropriate action.

Parameters:
query - A query string.
values - Parameters.
Returns:
the object.
Throws:
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
